title: (Pwn2Own) VMware Workstation UHCI Component Stack-based Buffer Overflow Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on affected installations of VMware Workstation. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute high-privileged code on the target guest system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the UHCI component. The issue results from the lack of proper validation of the length of user-supplied data prior to copying it to a fixed-length stack-based buffer. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code in the context of the hypervisor.
addtionnal_details: VMware has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://www.vmware.com/security/advisories/VMSA-2023-0008.html
timeline:
2023-03-30 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2023-05-01 - Coordinated public release of advisory
